content: > a guaranteed conversation-starter > this chunky starched bowl makes a > stunning display piece craft one for > yourself or gift it to someone > special gauge rounds 1 and 2 = 2 1/2 /6 5cm diameter **note if you like this bowl pattern you might also like my lace bowl from crochet adorned 1 ** from season 2 show 218 of knit and crochet now tv errata round 3 stitch count should read 16 double_crochet 16 single_crochet and **8 chain-5 sps ** round 11 should read double asterisk single_crochet in next **double_crochet** single_crochet in next chain 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/lace-bowl
